data.title: Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 release date, time: Where to watch 'Hashira Training' latest episode
meta_keywords: Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 release date time
Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 release date
data.meta_description: Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 is all set to be released today and will reveal critical details pertaining to the "Hashira Training".
data.text:
Synopsis

Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 is all set to be released today and will reveal critical details pertaining to the "Hashira Training".

Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 release date and time on Crunchyroll are here as fans of the anime are curious to watch what will happen in the "Hashira Training" episode on Sunday.

Demon Slayer season 4 - Hashira Training Arc was premiered on May 12 on Crunchyroll. While, the second episode of the ongoing season has revealed personal details of Giyu and subsequent help from Tanjiro.

In the third episode, Tanjiro is all set to join "The Hasira Training". Meanwhile, Lady Tamayo and Shinobu are joining hands to come up with a poison to fight Muzan, as per a ScreenRant report.

Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 is releasing on Crunchyroll at 10:45 AM (PT) on Sunday, May 26.

"Demon Slayer" anime, known for its gripping narrative, follows Tanjiro as he battles demons in early 1900s Japan, spurred by his sister Nezuko's transformation into a demon.

In Season 4, Tanjiro aims to achieve the rank of Hashira, undergoing rigorous training with Gyomei Himejima. Meanwhile, the Demon Slayer Corps prepares for a crucial battle against Muzan, who seeks to consume Nezuko. The season will adapt chapters 128-136 of the manga, promising a blend of action and character development.

FAQs:

Q1. When is Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 releasing?

A1. Demon Slayer season 4 episode 3 is releasing on Crunchyroll at 10:45 AM (PT) on Sunday, May 26.

Q2. Where can we watch Demon Slayer season 4?

A2. Demon Slayer season 4 can be watched on Crunchyroll.
